page.title: 09Visit Fothergill&Harvey 2
page.content: We went for a snack at the canteen.At 11:05 am we went to Greenvale.They had non woven machines which stuck the yarn together instead of weaving it. This material is used for roller towels,roofing felt and others .At 11:45 am we went to Tygaflor Division. They make non stick conveyer belts and other non stick fabrics covered with P.T.F.E.-an inert non-toxic resin.The fabric has to be flattened with a flat iron on hot metal to bond it to itself for machine belts.We had had a very enjoyable day.
